name: Balls! Virtual Reality Cricket
description: A Virtual Reality Cricket Game for the HTC Vive that emerges you right in the heart of the cricketing action. You find yourself in the middle facing a variety of bowlers from fast paced seam to off spin and leg spin as you try to hit a record score and join the Honours Board.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10, 64 bit Graphics: GTX 970 and above Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10, 64 bit Graphics: GTX 980 and above Storage: 500 MB available space
